codeSystems.name: MHVbloodPressurePositions
codeSystems.title: The methods of measurement for blood pressure that MHV supports
codeSystems.description: These are the loinc body positions that MHV supports on blood pressure.

codeSystems.name: MHVbloodSugarMethods
codeSystems.title: The methods of measurement for blood sugar that MHV supports
codeSystems.description: These are the SNOMED body sites that MHV supports.

codeSystems.name: MHVbodyTemperatureSites
codeSystems.title: The body temperature measurement sites that MHV supports
codeSystems.description: These are the SNOMED body sites that MHV supports.

codeSystems.name: MHVbodyTemperatures
codeSystems.title: The body temperature measurement types that MHV supports
codeSystems.description: These are the UCUM types that MHV supports.

codeSystems.name: MHVbodyWeights
codeSystems.title: The body weight measurement types that MHV supports
codeSystems.description: These are the UCUM types that MHV supports. This is a subset of the full bodyWeight types (which also brings in grams. Others might also include stone).

codeSystems.name: MHVmedicationRoutes
codeSystems.title: The routes of medication that MHV supports
codeSystems.description: These are the SNOMED-CT routes for medications that MHV supports.
